name: Flying Turtle
description:
You are one in a million, you are the flying turtle! Get through many different variants of hills and island and score points by eating leaves!

If you have some question, bugs or suggestions what to add for the game, send them to the following email - flyturtlegame@gmail.com

If you're interested in how the game was made you can check out the process on twitter at @Flying_Turtle_G

Have Fun and please leave feedback of the game!
